title: 为灵活组织思维，大脑利用空间
description: 麻省理工学院的研究人员测试了其空间计算理论，该理论认为大脑通过向大脑皮层施加脑波，来征召和控制临时神经元群以执行认知任务。
titleZh: 为灵活组织思维，大脑利用空间
titleEn: To organize thoughts flexibly, the brain uses space
descriptionZh: 麻省理工学院的研究人员测试了其空间计算理论，该理论认为大脑通过向大脑皮层施加脑波，来征召和控制临时神经元群以执行认知任务。
descriptionEn: MIT researchers tested their spatial computing theory, which suggests that the brain recruits and controls temporary populations of neurons to perform cognitive tasks by applying brain waves to the cerebral cortex.

title: 科技巨头在录音机领域“竞争”：人工智能和数据入口点的暗战
description: 随着钉钉、飞书相继推出人工智能录音笔硬件，一场企业办公数据入口点的暗战已悄然打响。
titleZh: 科技巨头在录音机领域“竞争”：人工智能和数据入口点的暗战
titleEn: Tech Giants "Compete" in Voice Recorders: A Covert Battle for AI and Data Entry Points
descriptionZh: 随着钉钉、飞书相继推出人工智能录音笔硬件，一场企业办公数据入口点的暗战已悄然打响。
descriptionEn: As DingTalk and Feishu successively launched AI-powered voice recorder hardware, a covert battle for enterprise office data entry points has quietly begun. This is not just competition in the hardware track, but a crucial strategic move by major tech giants to capture entry points into the physical world and restructure enterprise knowledge production processes in the AI era.
